projects.title: Wind Turbine Fault Prediction with SVM, PCA and LDA
projects.summary: Technical-business analysis of an AI pipeline for the wind sector for early fault detection using only current signatures.
projects.context: Unplanned wind turbine downtime can reach 237 h/year, directly affecting revenue and increasing maintenance costs. The proposed method uses only generator current signatures — a non-invasive approach that reduces CAPEX and OPEX — and achieves 97.6% accuracy in early fault detection.
projects.challenge: Develop a non-invasive and accurate method for fault detection in wind turbines, using only generator electrical signals, without the need for additional sensors.
decisions: Synthetic database construction using TurbSim (wind), FAST (GE 1.5s turbine) and MATLAB/Simulink (PMSG generator)
Preprocessing with PCA (99.99% variance) and LDA (6 components)
Modeling via SVM with RBF kernel and optimization via Grid-Search (10-fold CV)
Benchmark against k-NN, QDA, Trees, RF, AdaBoost, ANN and linear SVM
results: Global accuracy of 97.6% with F1 ≥ 0.92 in all classes
98% reduction in dataset size after PCA + LDA
Hyperparameter search time reduced to ~2 min
Method superior to competitors in all evaluated metrics

projects.title: Movie Genre Prediction Based on Posters
projects.summary: Analysis of movie genre classification using convolutional neural networks and transfer learning to identify visual patterns in movie posters.
projects.context: Automatic movie genre classification has important applications in streaming, content recommendation, and market analysis. By using only posters — already available and standardized resources — the method reduces implementation costs and provides valuable insights into cinema's visual communication.
projects.challenge: Develop a deep learning model capable of identifying visual patterns in movie posters and classifying them into movie genres with high accuracy, using only visual information.
decisions: Implementation of two architectures: custom neural network and VGG16 with transfer learning
Dataset of 45,000+ posters collected via TMDB API
Preprocessing with data augmentation and class balancing
results: Global accuracy of 85% in classifying major genres
Inference time less than 100ms per image

projects.title: MVP Social Betting Platform
projects.summary: A social betting platform focused on user engagement and retention through gamification and social features.
projects.context: Development of a social betting platform that combines traditional sports betting with social media elements to increase user engagement and lifetime value.
projects.challenge: Create a betting platform that stands out in a competitive market by focusing on social interaction and user experience rather than just odds and payouts.
decisions: Implementation of social features like friend challenges and leaderboards
Gamification system with points, badges, and levels
Real-time chat and comment system for events
results: 30% increase in user retention compared to traditional platforms
User acquisition cost reduced by 25% through referral system
